SEARCH
Package utilz

Class LoadSave

java.lang.Object
utilz.LoadSave
public class LoadSave extends Object
Utility class for loading and saving various resources such as sprite atlases and level images.

  • Method Details

    • GetSpriteAtlas

      public static BufferedImage GetSpriteAtlas(String fileName)
      Loads a sprite atlas image from the resources directory.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the sprite atlas file.
      Returns:
      The BufferedImage containing the loaded sprite atlas.

    • GetAllLevels

      public static BufferedImage[] GetAllLevels()
      Retrieves all level images from the "lvls" directory in the resources folder. The files are sorted numerically based on their names.
      Returns:
      An array of BufferedImages containing all the loaded level images.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the directory is not found or there is an I/O error.
